issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement simple math operations in physical query plan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6696](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6696). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update BinaryExpr to support simple math operations such as +, -, \*, / using compute kernels where possible.

See the original implementation when executing directly from the logical plan for inspiration.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6696?focusedCommentId=16946282) by Kyle McCarthy (kylemccarthy):*
Are you wanting to include the modulo operation? Or do you want to stick to the basics (plus, minus, multiply, divide)?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6696?focusedCommentId=16946812) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5599
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5599>
